title: Restaurant Website
description: Restaurant Web is a responsive and modern restaurant website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features smooth animations, easy navigation, and an engaging user experience, making it a perfect solution for showcasing restaurant businesses online.

title: Company website
description: Go Green is a responsive portfolio website showcasing web, app, and game development services. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it features a modern UI, smooth navigation, and SEO optimization for a strong online presence.

title: Soul Connect
description: Soul Connect is a full-stack video conferencing web app with real-time video, audio, and chat features using WebRTC and Socket.io. It supports screen sharing, secure user authentication, and room management with unique links. Built with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, it offers a seamless and responsive experience across all devices.
